name: A Cyberpunk's Dream of 2077
summary:
Passed out after a night of New Year’s Eve partying, you are awoken from your drunken stupor by a RetailBot.

This robot informs you that it had a dream, and would like your help in determining its meaning.

You are free to help or hinder this robot.

Just remember: words and actions can have consequences…

A (very short) cyberpunk visual novel
Dialogue system inspired by RPG classics
Four distinct endings based off your choices throughout the game
Pixel graphics!
Featuring photography from Unsplash.com and music by Alexander Nakarada
